meta.name: note
meta.content: Not clear what the edition was

chapter.name: September 1: Begining of the Indiction & Commemoration of our Venerable Father Simeon
September 2: Holy Martyr Mamas & St. John The Faster, Patriarch Of Constantinople
September 3: Holy Hieromartyr Anthimus, Bishop of Nicomedia
September 3: Holy Passion-Bearer Edward, King of England
September 4: Holy Hieromartyr Babylas & Holy Prophet Moses
September 4: Holy Hierarch Joasaph, Bishop of Belgorod
September 5: Holy Prophet Zacharias & the Holy Righteous Elizabeth
September 5: Martyred Monk Athanasius, Abbot of Brest
September 6: Commemoration of the Miracle performed by the Archangel Michael at Colossae
September 6: Righteous Prince Peter & Princess Febronia, Wonderworkers of Murom
Saturday before the Exaltation of the Cross
September 7: Forefeast of the Nativity of the All-holy Theotokos & Commemoration of the Holy Martyr Sozon
September 7: Holy Venerable Martyr Macarius, Wonderworker of Kanev
September 7: Venerable Mother Cassiana, the Hymnographer
September 8: Nativity of the All-holy Theotokos and Ever-virgin Mary
September 8: Finding of the Wonderworking Icon of the Most Holy Theotokos Known As the Kursk-Root Icon of the Sign
September 9: Commemoration of the Holy & Righteous Ancestors of God, Joachim & Anna
September 10: Holy Martyrs Menodora, Metrodora and Nymphodora
September 11: Venerable Mother Theodora of Alexandria
September 11: Our Venerable Fathers Sergius and Herman, Wonderworkers of Valaam
September 12: Leave-taking of the Nativity of the All-holy Theotokos
September 13: Commemoration of the Dedication of the Church of the Holy Sepulcher & Holy Hieromartyr Cornelius the Centurion
September 14: Universal Exaltation of the Precious & Life-creating Cross
September 15: Holy Greatmartyr Nicetas
September 15: Appearance of the Wonder-Working Lesna Icon of the All-Holy Theotokos
September 16: Holy Greatmartyr Euphemia the Most Praised
September 17: Holy Martyrs Sophia & Her Three Daughters:
September 18: Venerable Father Eumenius, Bishop Of Gortyna, The Wonderworker
September 19: Holy Martyrs Trophimus, Sabbatius & Dorymedon
September 19: Holy Passion-bearer, the Pious Prince Igor of Chernigov
September 20: Holy Greatmartyr Eustathius
September 21: Leave-taking of the Exaltation of the Precious Cross
September 21: St. Demetrius, Metropolitan of Rostov, the Wonderworker
September 22: Holy Hieromartyr Phocas, Bishop of Sinope
September 22: Commemoration Of Our Venerable Fathers Whose Incorrupt Relics Rest In The Near Caves Of Kiev
September 22: Service to the Twenty-Six Martyred Monks of Zographou
September 23: Conception of the Honorable and Glorious Prophet, Forerunner and Baptist John
September 24: Holy Protomartyr and Equal of the Apostles Thecla
September 25: Venerable Mother Euphrosyne
September 25: Venerable Father Sergius The Wonder-Worker, Abbot Of Radonezh
September 26: Repose Of The Holy Apostle & Evangelist John The Theologian
September 27: Holy Martyr Callistratus & His Companions
September 28: Venerable Father Chariton the Confessor
September 28: Holy Passion-bearer, the Right-believing Prince Wenceslaus of Bohemia
September 29: Venerable Father Cyriacus the Anchorite
September 30: Holy Hieromartyr Gregory Of Greater Armenia
September 30: St. Michael, First Metropolitan of Kiev, Wonderworker of All Russia
